data.message: Please give me the option to permanently set my News Feed Preference to Most Recent.  I have NO DESIRE to see Top Stories.  I've been asking for this for well over a year now.  Thanks.

replies.message: Hi Adam. You can adjust what you see in your News Feed by hiding stories you don't want to see, by following or unfollowing friends, by choosing to see fewer stories from certain friends and by using “See First”. Learn how at: http://bit.ly/2r7qEvI. We've also found that many people have a better experience when they can tell us what they'd like to see. If there is something we can do to improve your News Feed experience, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2qC6TsC. -William
I know that this tedious option is available to me and it is unacceptable.  Just provide me with a default option of Most Recent so I can set to see Most Recent.
